tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    data JSON
)

CREATE TABLE motion_detector_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    motion_detected BOOLEAN,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE camera_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    camera_id INT,
    camera_location VARCHAR(100),
    motion_detected BOOLEAN,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE motion_detectors (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  motion_detected TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE cameras (
  camera_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  camera_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
  entry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  data_type VARCHAR(50),
  data_value VARCHAR(255),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE alerts (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  entry_id INT,
  alert_type VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE video_recordings (
  recording_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  camera_id INT,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP
)
